long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Just click the copy icon but here it is written in detail:

1.) Click the icon on Neo BullX (https://neo.bullx.io/)
2.) Watch how the address gets transferred to Telegram (you have to open https://web.telegram.org/k/#@TradeonNovaBot before, the tab can be inactive)
3.) Automated pasting
4.) Nova Telegram Bot responds
5.) Optional: Configure 'Auto Buy' under /menu -> Settings
to make it even faster

Neo2Nova helps buying fast! After clicking the copy icon, it transfers a SOLANA address from neo.bullx.io and sends it to the Nova Bot (@TradeonNovaBot, URL: https://web.telegram.org/k/#@TradeonNovaBot) on Telegram. Afterwards, for example, you can enable 'Auto Buy' under /menu > Settings > Auto Buy to increase the speed of the meme-coin buying process on Neo BullX. 

If you like the extension any form of donation is very much appreciated:
